nodes.text: The Revos Spaceport was a spaceport located in Revos city on the planet Storinal. It was a duracrete circle two or more kilometers in diameter, with ferrocrete bunkers scattered all over.

Around 7 ABY, Warlord Zsinj controlled the planet. Four TIE Fighters were kept in constant readiness at the spaceport in case of an attack, two of which were stolen by members of Wraith Squadron during their Mission to Storinal.
